item.description:
What: A casual hike & ramble around Purgatory Chasm MA (about 45' south of Worcester towards Providence on Rt 146)
When: THIS SUNDAY 11/15 @ 11:00 AM
Why: I lost a lens cap there

The rain and wind are coming all day Saturday. Sooooooo let's gather Sunday late morning for a ramble around Purgatory Chasm. I have only been there once, and am looking forward to going back.

The meet place will be the parking lot on the left that is less than 5 minutes from Rt 146.
Sturdy shoes are a must for this place. There are plenty of easy paths, as well as more "adventurous" routes for those so inclined.

I'm in a blue Ford Explorer with MA "Birthplace of Basketball" Tags.

I have not checked out food options in the area - but there is always something if people want to get a bite after we are done at the Chasm. You may want to bring something with you - perhaps water and a snack - for the hike.

Note to self: must find out why it is called "Purgatory" Chasm on this visit.
So who's up for a ramble?

Paul

Carpe Carp - Seize the Fish
item.name: Casual Hike and Ramble at Purgatory Chasm
